meanings.sent1: The cloth felt dampnesses after being left out in the rain.
meanings.sent2: The grass was covered in dampnesses from the morning dew.
meanings.sent3: The dampnesses on the windows made funny shapes when the sun shone through.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was like the dampnesses of a fresh morning, refreshing and invigorating.
meanings.sent5: The smell of dampnesses in the air signaled the arrival of spring showers.

meanings.sent1: She could feel the dampnesses of the basement seeping through her shoes.
meanings.sent2: The old house had a musty smell due to the dampnesses in the walls.
meanings.sent3: The dampnesses in the air made her hair frizzy and wild.
meanings.sent4: His mood matched the dampnesses of the rainy day, gloomy and subdued.
meanings.sent5: The dampnesses of the forest floor created a soft carpet for the animals to walk on.
